narratives.evidence_quote: जर्मनी अभी भी रूस के खिलाफ कड़े प्रतिबंध लगाने से बच रहा है. उसे अपने देश की अर्थव्यवस्था की ज्यादा चिंता है.
narratives.reasoning: The sentence criticizes Western diplomacy and Germany's cautious stance toward sanctions, implying incompetence or bias in Western policy.

narratives.narrative_name: URW: Negative Consequences for the West
narratives.evidence_quote: उसे डर लग रहा है कि रूस पर प्रतिबंध लगाने से जर्मनी को बड़ा आर्थिक नुकसान हो जाएगा.
narratives.reasoning: The sentence predicts adverse economic consequences for a Western country (Germany) due to sanctions, aligning with forecasting harm to Western interests.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Discrediting the West, Diplomacy: The West does not care about Ukraine, only about its interests
subnarratives.evidence_quote: उसे अपने देश की अर्थव्यवस्था की ज्यादा चिंता है. उसे डर लग रहा है कि रूस पर प्रतिबंध लगाने से जर्मनी को बड़ा आर्थिक नुकसान हो जाएगा.
subnarratives.reasoning: The quote highlights Western actors prioritizing their own economic interests over Ukraine, aligning with the subnarrative that the West does not truly care about Ukraine but its own interests.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Discrediting the West, Diplomacy: Diplomacy does/will not work
subnarratives.evidence_quote: बातचीत से कोई रास्ता नहीं निकला है
subnarratives.reasoning: The statement asserts that negotiations have failed to yield a path forward, implying that diplomacy is ineffective in resolving the conflict.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Negative Consequences for the West: Sanctions imposed by Western countries will backfire
subnarratives.evidence_quote: उस डर लग रहा है कि रूस पर प्रतिबंध लगाने से जर्मनी को बड़ा आर्थिक नुकसान हो जाएगा
subnarratives.reasoning: The quote expresses fear that sanctions on Russia will cause substantial economic damage to Germany, indicating that Western sanctions could backfire on Western economies.
